reasons: Commuting to/from work / Se rendre au travail / Revenir du travail;Leisure / Loisir;Go to my religious meeting;
variation: Yes - day / Oui, en fonction du jour;
why variation: I cannot always use my bike to commute because I live more than 23 km far from my work. I cannot put my bike into train after 06.30 AM and I tried last and I though I might have got a fine for doing so. I am also scared to be assaulted early morning when it is dark in the streets.
comments: More light into the streets. Be allowed to take the bike on trains after 06.30 AM and after 05.00 PM.
